title: Mastery of Cross-Sectional Anatomy Through Technology-Enhanced Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic anatomy knowledge and medical imaging interpretation skills
context.additional_context: Advanced learner-targeted program for understanding the correlation between 3D anatomical structures and radiographic imaging.

learning_goals: Explain 3D anatomical structures with over 80% accuracy by analyzing 2D cross-sectional images
Identify positional relationships among major thoracic cross-sectional anatomy structures with 90% accuracy across three practical evaluations through collaborative learning activities
When utilizing CTML-based digital tools, learner engagement achieves an average of 4.2 or higher on a 5-point Likert scale.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
